title: Refactor: Extract pagination logic into shared helper
description:
## Context
Review comment from PR #1 (comment ID: 2709909502)

gh api /repos/devonjones/devon-claude-skills/pulls/1/comments/2709909502

## Suggestion
The pagination logic for fetching all review threads is duplicated in several scripts:
- get-review-comments.sh
- get-agent-comments.sh
- reopen-comment.sh
- reply-to-comment.sh
- summarize-reviews.sh

While the GraphQL queries differ slightly in the fields they fetch, the pagination boilerplate is identical.

## Proposed Solution
Create a shared helper function that takes the core query fragment as an argument and handles pagination. Could be added to _jq_helpers.sh or a new _github_helpers.sh.

title: Refactor: Deduplicate get_comment_count function
description:
## Context
Review comment from PR #1 (comment ID: 2709909507)

gh api /repos/devonjones/devon-claude-skills/pulls/1/comments/2709909507

## Suggestion
The `get_comment_count` function is defined in both:
- trigger-review.sh
- get-review-comments.sh

Duplicating helper functions makes maintenance harder, as changes need to be applied in multiple places.

## Proposed Solution
Move this function into a shared script, like `_jq_helpers.sh` or a new `_github_helpers.sh`, and source it where needed.
